review: What a piece of crap! Shame on you google for putting out a lame useless piece of equipment! Way to lazy it up even more by not even providing a remote! A remote mind you that would had worked on EVERY unit no matter if the consumer had to provide the "remote" ie you smartphone or laptop! Just plan lazy! Oh and I hope your "remote" is better than mine and my wifes "remote". Iphone 5c??? wont even recognize it from 6" away! Also google you take 1st place for laziness for this simple fact, Chromecast is not a "streaming" device because if you dont have a required "remote" you SOL. Chromecaast expects you to find the content you wish to watch on your "remote" ie smartphone tablet laptop (compatiable of course) then "stream" more like beam the content to the Chromecast which in turn is "displayed" if one wishes to classify display as being 30 secs of video followed by an eternity of 99% buffering, the result of my wifes "remote" (samsung s5) now keep in mind we downloaded the recommend chromecast app and both have Tmobile cell service.  I would like to end this review by saying, this is my VERY FIRST amazon product review. Ive been burned before, had problems with sellers, problems with recieving the wrong product, and problem with return, but google finally broke the bank with the lazy, cheap, complicated, middle man, excuse for a streaming device! Shame on you google!
